ada mema ‘nila hora’ hitiyatath wada hondin thama ‘blu ruf’ mandiraye suwase wesenu dakiya hakiya. 2015 janawari 08 dina, horungen thora sha්ri lankawak pathamin yahapalana aanduwata chundaya dun janathawa me wanawita nannaththara wi sitiyayi pawasiya athishayokthiyak nowe. 2014di sha්ri lankika purawasiyeku daru badu bara rupiyal 50,000ki. 2017 wanawita meya rupiyal 81,000k dakwa ihala gos atha. 2015di rate eeka pudgala wayabara rupiyal 373,462k wiya. 2016 awasanaya wana wita meya rupiyal 417,913 dakwa ihala giyeya.

1617 di henri brigs ohuge 1000ta adu siyalu nikhilawala ata wana dashamasthanaya dakwa laghu ganaka adangu wana podu laghu ganaka waguwe prathama kotasa prakashayata path kaleya. 1624 di nawatha ohu wisin prakashayata pathkala arithmatika logarithmika hi , 1 sita 20,000 dakwa da, 90,00 sita 100,000 dakwa da siyalu nikhilawala dahathara wana dashamasthanaya dakwa laghu ganaka adangu wana athara ehi siddhantha ha laghu ganakawala bhawithaya sampurnayenma wisthara kara athi igenum handinwimak da anthargathaya. 20,000 sita 90,000 dakwa wu hidasa oolanda jathika ganithagnyayeku wu adriyan wlak wisin purawana lada muth ohuge waguwe adangu wuye laghu ganaka dasa wana dashamasthanaya dakwa pamani.
